## Protocol.Debugger.SetAsyncCallStackDepthRequest.maxDepth property

Maximum depth of async call stacks. Setting to `0` will effectively disable collecting async call stacks (default).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
maxDepth: integer;
```
